snippet: BERNSTEIN--Daniel P. June 19, 2016-Wishing you love on the anniversary of your birth and Father's Day. Dearly missed since you were taken from us all. Daniel, Sarah, Jamie and Carly know your beauty-marked smile, which beams from photos in our homes. Your intelligence, creativity and humor pervades in each of them. You are forever in our hearts. Peter, Andrew, Naomi, Warner, Pat, Sherry, Julie, Jimmy, Kim and Jackson. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BERNSTEIN--Daniel P. June 19, 2016-Wishing you love on the anniversary of your birth and Father's Day. Dearly missed since you were taken from us all. Daniel, Sarah, Jamie and Carly know your beauty-marked smile, which beams from photos in our homes. Your intelligence, creativity and humor pervades in each of them. You are forever in our hearts. Peter, Andrew, Naomi, Warner, Pat, Sherry, Julie, Jimmy, Kim and Jackson. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  BERNSTEIN, DANIEL P
